abstract: Brian Seibert reviews premiere of dance piece The Rehearsal, performed and choreographed by Cuqui Jerez at the Performing Garage.
snippet: The Spanish choreographer Cuqui Jerez presented “The Rehearsal” at home at the Performing Garage, headquarters of the Wooster Group.
lead_paragraph: The Spanish choreographer Cuqui Jerez presented “The Rehearsal” at home at the Performing Garage, headquarters of the Wooster Group.

headline.main: One Definition of Collaboration: Putting Heads Together, Then Taking Turns
headline.print_headline: One Definition of Collaboration: Putting Heads Together, Then Taking Turns
